1.content: You wake happy and still very tired after a very long night of partying and you lazily open your eyes, can you see or not.
1.title: It begins

choices: I can but my arms and legs feel funny
11.content: Okay then don't panic, you might have a blindfold on after all. Can you move your body at least.
11.title: Can you move

111.content:
Not only is everything black all around you, but you also find that you cannot move any part of your body.

What will you do?
111.title: No not even an inch

choices: you find yourself unable to really fall asleep
you dream, and something happens inside the dream
1111.content: Since you find that it might not be that much of a big deal in being unable to move your body and seeing what you're doing, the best option might be to fall asleep. Maybe then, things will sort itself out after waking up.
1111.title: Go Back to Sleep

1113.content:
You decide to spend just a little bit of time waiting, and listening. While you are doing this, you takes note of your strange surroundings. The reason that you can't move, is that your entire body-which is butt naked- seems to be surrounded by some sort of strange material. It is warm and slimy, and almost seems to be alive, like some sort of fleshy material. What's even stranger, is that there seems to be some sort of long, tentical-like, tube, running down your throught.

It seems to be supplying all of your oxygen, somehow. It's odd, but not painful. Just unpleasant, somehow.

Then, like a tun of bricks, a strange, realization hits you:

'It's almost like I'm back in the womb!' You think.

Still, it's warm, and somewhat pleasant here, you think. In fact, you can't remember the last time you felt so secure and contented.

You stay like this for who knows how long-half awake, half asleep, until all of a sudden, you look down below your feet, to see a bright, white, light, streaming in to your warm, dark, little world. It's super bright, and you are immediately forced to close your eyes, as soon as you see it.

Then, all of a sudden, you feel the tube in your inside you come snaking out. You panic, as you find yourself suddenly unable to breath. But after only a few seconds, the walls of material around you begins squeezing tightly against your body. It's so tight, it hurts, and you fear your body will be crushed if this keeps up. Instead however, it stops after a few seconds, to your relief, though you are still scared of suffocation. A moment later, the squeezing starts all over again, this time pressing you downward, towards the light for a few seconds, before stopping again. For the next several minutes, this continues, squeezing and stopping and squeezing and stopping, until your feet reach the hole of light. A few moments after that, your feet have cleared the hole, and into the air on the outside. Finally, your legs, up to your knees have left the warm, fleshy, prison.

At this point, you receive a shock big enough to dwarf even everything so far: a giant hand grabs your legs, pulling you the rest of the way out. You gasp for air, relieved that you can breath again, but wishing you could see through this intense light! The hand pulls you up by both legs, and holds you, dangling upside down for a moment. The next thing you know, you feel a quick, sharp, smack by another hand, on your bare, defenseless, bottom. The hand is bigger than your whole butt, and it hurts SO MUCH! All you can do is cry.

"Welcome to Moolican, Baby boy!"

You hear a voice say.

"Congratulations, Miss Miller," it then says, "he's a healthy, Baby boy." He seems to have done just fine on the trip over here. His vitals are all a optimal. Just let me get him dressed, then you can hold him for the first time."

Next, still crying, and still unable to open your eyes, you find yourself carried by this giant person across the room-what just happened? Forced out of a warm-WOMB!??- then spanked-OMG! It's like you just got BORN again! Next, you are lain down, and quickly powdered, before having a diapered wrapped around your waist.

Then, you feel yourself being handed off to another woman, your head resting against a pair of breast which are each larger than your head!

"Hello, Sweetie," says a second voice. It is soothing, warm, and sweet. "I know this is all very new a strange to you, so let me explain a little. First of all, you are on another planet. The reason you are so weak, and cannot open your eyes yet, is that you have been traveling through space for over ten years. You are now almost as weak as a baby. And that is exactly what you will be, from now on. I will be your Mommy, and you will be my Baby. I know that you still have the mind of an adult, so you act up, or try to escape, Mommy will have to punish you. Now, I know you can't see me yet, but for now, you need to just get used to my voice, and my sent, and my touch, and esepcially, my TASTE.

With that, you feel a bare nipple up next to your lips-she wants to breast feed you!

"Now, eat up, Sweety. Suckle like a good boy!

Part of you finds this very erotic, as you begin to grow hard in your diaper, but on the other hand, this is also extremely strange, and embarassing! Still, where would you GO even if you DID escape???
1113.title: Rebirth....on Another Planet...?

choices: Panic and run around trying to find something or someone for help.
Calmly sit and consider exactly how you ended up like this.
Try calling out to someone for help.
112.content:
The first thing you do is try to remove your blindfold. Though you were still half asleep, however, the fact that your arms were not moving most definitely woke you up. Trying not to panic, you feel you're in some sort of an outfit, as your arms are in sleeves, like any other piece of clothing. However, said sleeves are on the inside of whatever it is that you're wearing, your arms are covered by something, and you can't move them as a result...

Sitting up, you realize you feel kind of soft, slick, and you feel the fabric that covers your arms is also covering the rest of your body. Coming to the conclusion that whatever is covering your eyes is attached to whatever you're wearing, you sit for a moment allowing everything to sink in. You're in a one piece outfit of some sort, you can't see, and you can't use your arms for anything, and as a result, cannot take this outfit off by yourself.

In a situation like this, there is really only one thing to do...

113.title: Immobile From the Arms Down.

1131.content:
You can feel the blood rushing to your head, it may be what woke you up. Looking up, or down depending on your persepctive you can see the rest of your body and you soon realise why you are having trouble moving.
You are attached to a wire and a hook like a prize winning trout. The reason you are presented like a prize wining trout is because you seem to be more fish than man right now. From the waist down you can see a glimmering tail, scales catching the light. These scales run up your back and front, from what you can see with the front rows ending in rather large pert breasts. You bring your hands up to touch them but stop as you see scales running along them as well and the fact that they are now webbed means you spend a few minutes admiring them by the light. Once done so you return to the breasts.
It is easier to tell from the breasts than your webbed fingers that this is all fake. Or at least you are getting the least enjoyment out of playing with your breasts ever. Considering the circumstances this is understandable, considering you have never had breasts before, less so. You look down to the fish tail and realise that this means your legs are probably still real but merely trapped inside. Now that you think about it you think you can feel them.
This also explain why you can't feel the chill too much as the costume seems to take up much of your body. At that thought you have a horrible feeling of it warping your face into some hideous fish creature parody. You stop yourself from checking, you need to escape first and then deal with what you are wearing.
You can't dig a nail or anything in to remove the costume so it's a case of removing the hook from your tail and sliding about your new home in search of something to help. But how to get down.
You could always scream for help or you could act like a man, pull yourself up to the tip of your tail like an upside down toe touch and unhook it your damn self.

choices: You Finish Without Your Panties Getting Wet!
1132.content:
"It sounds like he's awake!" You here a young lady's voice, say, "Get the light!"

You flinch from the brightness, as a light is turned on.

"Rise and shine," Says the voice, as several other female voices giggle and snicker.

As your eyes finally ajust, you look around you to see several beautiful, sexy, college-aged girls standing around in white painters suits.

"Wh, where am I?" You ask, confused, "What's going on?"

All the girls break into laughter for a moment, before the leader calms them.

"Hahah! Nice try. You know the rules! No talking!"

"What rules??" You ask, "I don't even know where I am!"

She laughs again. "Ok... you were a bit trashed when they brought you in, last night. So, I'll jar your memory! You fraternity, Ji-See-Sigma, brought you here, because you were chosen for this traditional crossover between your fraternity, and this, your sister sorority, the Gee Fim-Sata, Sorrority. Now, here's how it works.."

"WAIT!" You interupt! "There's been a mistake!" I'm not IN any fraternity! I don't even go to college!"

"No interupting!" She shouts, "Gag him!" with that, one of the girls comes up to you and, using a ladder, because you are pinned up so high, comes up to you, and after punching you in the gut, jams a pair of panties in your mouth to silence you.

"Much better!" Says the leader.

"Now, as I was saying. The rules are simple: AS you can see, we have pinned you up in a sack to the wall, dressed in nothing but a pair of white panties, and socks." The girls all giggle and you blush bright red with embarassment (though, you can't help admitting, they do kinda feel good.)

"We will throw water balloons at you, trying to get them to your body. That's why you're wearing the white panties. According to the rules, white men's briefs can be used, but we find it alot more fun this way! Anyway, point being, the water is dies blue, so if those panties have any blue on them, that's a strike against you. This also goes for the socks your wearing, because it even counts if the balloon doesn't burst until it goes down to your feet. It's up to you to stop the balloons. That's why your arms are free. You try to catch them and return fire. So, what are the stakes, you ask? Well, if you get even ONE strike against you, we get to turn you into our baby for the month! If, however, we only hit the outside of the bag, you merely recieve a bare bottom spanking in front of the whole sorority, then go on your way. If, however, one of US ends up with blue on us, then that girl has to spend the next month in just her underwear, whether we baby you or NOT! So, I think we've covered all the rules. So, without further adu, let the games begin!"

You gulp as the balloons start flying at you.

how will you fair?

1133.content:
Not only are you surrounded by darkness, unable to move anything but your arms, but you realize you are also wearing some sort of strange, thick, garment around your mid section. It only takes you a few minutes to realize that it's huge DIAPER! What's more, is you've started wetting it!

You feel down at your side, by your hands, a huge baby bottle!

Then, to your shock, you hear a woman's voice coming in over a loud speaker, filling up the room, which from the sound of things, must be very vast!

"Awwwe. It seems that little baby has wet his diaper and needs to be changed. But baby is afraid of the dark, and doesn't want to wake up on his own! We need the audience to sing his favorite song, Rockabye, Baby, to help him wake up!"

With that, the voice leads the song, which you soon start to hear from HUNDREDS OF PARTICIPANTS, as a dim stage light begins to shine on you! Your on stage in a wet diaper, being sung to by HUNDREDS OF PEOPLE!!

"Thank you all for your participation, as we wait for Little One to come to, and react to his current situation. As you know, this is an interactive stage play, where the protagonist's own actions determine the outcome of the play. That said, let's keep singing and see what kind of mood Baby wakes up in.Will he wake up in an agreeable mood, simply goo gooing and giggling, or well it act out like a moody, bad boy?"

Great! You think, furiously, Someone has tricked you into this play, and it's up to you to pick your own punishment and humiliation.
You'd better act wisely.
1133.title: DIAPERED Stage Debut!

choices: Give In and Open Up For Your Medicine
11331.content:
Blushing bright red with embarrassment, you turn your head away from the audience and try to ignore them. Maybe, if you make a BAD enough and BORING enough show, then the people putting this thing on, will have no choice but to end the show and release you.

You are about to find out that it's just not that simple.

After several minutes, you hear the woman's voice speak, once more.

"Uh Oh. Looks like Baby's not feeling well. Not to worry, Nursy is here to check up on him, and get him feeling better."

'oh no!' you think, opening your eyes, wide.

A few moments later, you look over to the edge of the stage, to see a tall woman dressed in a sexy nurse's uniform, walking onto the stage. She looks large and in charge, but still very sexy and effeminate.

A moment later, she comes over to your cradle, and starts cooing at you in baby talk.

"Awwe," she says, "Is baby not feeling well?"

With that, she undoes the covers with little effort. (Something which, with all your own strength, you weren't even able to budge.) Next, she walks you across the stage to a bed, where she sits down, and drapes you across her ample, beautiful, lap. You try to struggle away, but a quick slap on your wet, diapered, bottom, forces you to calm down. Next, to the great aproval of the audience, she pulls open your diaper, before sticking a thermometer up your butt.

The audience is loving it, but you are blushing bright red, trying not to cry. However, by the time she pulls the thermometer out, you have begun to cry. She holds it up to the audience, declaring:

"Uh oh, looks like Baby has a fever!"

You blush bright red with both embarrassment and anger-you actually feel fine, medically, this is of course, just part of the show.

Next, she closes up your wet diaper, and wraps two more, larger, diapers, over it, before carrying you over to high chair. Next, she gets out a spoon full of some sort of medicine, bringing it towards your mouth.

"Now, now, Sweety."She says, her tone both cheerful but stern, "Take your medicine. It is just to help you go potties!"

You sit there, frozen.

"Now, now," her tone grows harsher, "if Baby doesn't behave, Nursy will have to take harsher measures!"

122.title: What I'm wearing

1221.content:
"What the fuck?" You grumble aloud to yourself.

The sound of your own voice causes your head to throb. You clench your eyes shut and rub your temples. As the pain passes you open your eyes and look around. You are sitting on the floor of your room, alone. Your door is shut and your phone sits charging on your nightstand.

You stand up and topple over onto your bed. You reach over and grab your photo. It is 8 in the morning on Saturday. If your roommates partied as hard as you did, and it was probably a good guess that they did, then they would be asleep until at least noon.

You roll over and look at the ceiling. There you are, on your bed, wearing nothing but a diaper. You don't know how you came to wear a diaper last night, and you don't think you really want to know. Your hangover is brutal and you just want to sleep it off. On the other hand, it would probably be a good idea to get rid of the diaper before anyone accidentally sees you in it.
1221.title: A diaper

choices: Your roommates are in the room
12211.content:
"Fuck it," You think as you pull your blankets up over you.

You immediately fall back asleep. Unfortunately, you toss and turn. Your sleep is restless and don't feel any better when you finally wake back up.

Grabbing your phone you check the time to see that only twenty minutes have passed. Groaning, you roll over. This time, your sleep is more restful. You sleep for several hours and have very strange, very vivid dreams. All of your dreams seemed to focus around your roommates and diapers.

Finally, you wake up again. Three hours have passed. It is now almost noon and you still feel terrible. Thankfully, your hangover is gone and you are just sleep deprived. You throw the blanket off of you and freeze. It is then that you notice:
12211.title: Go back to sleep

choices: Your panties have been replaced with diapers
122111.content:
Your two roommates, Kelsey and Maggie are standing in your room looking down on you. You completely forgot that you were wearing a diaper. Kelsey and Maggie begin to giggle, which soon erupts into raucous laughter.

"Oh my God," Kelsey stammers, pointing at your diaper. "I can't believe that you actually wore that the entire night."

"What do you mean?" You stammer, trying to cover yourself with the blankets.

"It's okay, sweetheart," Maggie coos as she pulls your blankets off of your bed. "Your roommates are here to take care of a precious little thing like you."

"It's not funny," You pout, your face turning red.

"Be nice, Maggie," Kelsey scolds. "She did manage to keep herself dry throughout the night."

You were at least relieved that you hadn't actually soiled yourself; but now that Kelsey mentioned it, you did need to use the bathroom. Your bladder was nearly ready to burst.

1231222.content:
You jump in surprise and fear, as you see the door open.

Please don't let anyone see me like this! you think, almost wetting your pants, just from the situation.

You see a large, busty, matronly looking woman walk in. She looks to be about 50, and seems to be large and in charge. Her grey is her black hair is in a tight bun. Otherwise, she wears an outfit like a 50s maid.

"Hello there," she says, walking right up to you.

"Who are you?" You ask, shakingly. She slaps you right in the face.

"I am the Matron of this house, but you will call me Madom. Your new name will be Missy. Now, it is far past time for you to be going and meeting Sir. However, he likes his new girls to start off with wet diapers for him to change."

All of a sudden, without warning, she grabs your shoulder with one hand, then reaches up under your dress, and sticks a finger up inside your diaper.

"Hey! You protest," but she ignores you, holding you firmly with her hand while the other wiggles around your crotch.

"Shameful! Sir will not be happy if I send you to him in a dry diaper. Now, will you be able to wet on your one, or shall I assist you?"
1231222.title: Meeting the Matron

12312222.content:
"You can't be serious! I don't know why I'm even wearing a diaper, it this sicko "Sir" can kiss my ass if he thinks I am going to wet myself! Now, let me out of here!"

She looks at you sternly, shaking her head.

"Tsk, tsk. Ok, Baby. It looks like we will have to do this the hard way."

She grabs you, slinging you over her shoulder, and carrying you across the room. She slings you down on a wooden table, where she chains you down. All the while, you are kicking and screaming. That is, until she straps a pacifier aprons your head.

"There! Much better! Now then, let's get this diaper properly wetted..."

She tilts the table up, almost vertical. Then, she walks right up to you, pulling your dress up. She reaches under her own dress and pulls down a pair of pull-up training pants. She straddles your figure, pulling your diapers out. Closing her eyes, she begins to pee right into your diapers as you scream with disgust and terror. You had never been gay, or liked other women, and this was certainly not how you would have wanted to start.

"Much better!," she says, taking you off the table, but leaving your pacifier in place.

Now then, lets go meet Sir.
12312222.title: Missy the Unruly Diapered Maid.

choices: Get me out of this thing!
I make a pretty attractive girl!
12313.content:
You lazily open your eyes and instantly identify that something is very wrong. You can just see past the two small white lumps on you chest to see that you are wearing a skin tight, full body white suit, you instantly get up and brunette hair falls on your face. You push it out the way.

You also notice you are wearing makeup, you are not sure what yet but you are sure that you are wearing some kind of makeup. You notice the bunny ears on your head and start to walk to the bathroom to get a better look at yourself.

You see yourself in the mirror, you are in a white satin skin tight white body suit, complete with a bunny tail, little bunny feet and furry bunny hands. Someone has decorated your face with lots of makeup, red lipstick, foundation, blush, mascara, everything.

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736...

Your instant response is
12313.title: No, you are wearing something else...

1232.content: Do you see yourself, or does something else get your attention first?
1232.title: Other things you could see when you wake up.

12321.content:
and to your shock your wearing http://www.figleaves.com/uk/dita-von-tee... this.

you stand there for a little while and realzed you leg hurts a little and you look at you leg and see https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736... and that you have a feminine looking tattoo on you leg as well.

Can you remember what happened last night?
12321.title: You see yourself

info.brief_description: You wake up after a night of partying and something is wrong.
info.description:
Hello to anyone who reads this story. This is my first story on this site and I am looking forward to see how it progresses so thanks in advance for reading it and a super gigantic thanks in advance if you add to it :).

Okay then as for the story it's self, I'm going to set up a scenario where a person partied a little too hard and ends up dressed in a rather embarrassing outfit and situation.

I do have just a couple of rules that I would like to talk about, just in case you wanted to add to this story which include:

Keeping the story to it's 18+ rating,
No death of any character
No physical change to main character (Although things like tattoo's are allowed)
No mental change to main character
No transformation of any character

And as for a few of the things that you're allowed to do then:

Any costume is allowed as long as it would follow the 18+ rating
Silly events are allowed such as an alien abduction or something
And anything else you can think of as long as it follows the above rules

Plus if you have any questions then please don't hesitate to send me an Email and I'll get back to you as quick as possible :)

So thanks again for reading my story and I can't wait to see how it will turn out, enjoy :)
